https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oHYRYgEcpjD6tXRxMr5xisjJCU4.jpg Paris, 1930. Luis Buñuel is penniless after the scandal surrounding the release of his last movie. Sculptor Ramón Acín, a good friend, buys a lottery ticket and promises Buñuel that he will pay for his next movie if he wins the prize. Buñuel in the Labyrinth of the Turtles
